description: From Ancient Greek πόσος (pósos, “how much?”)  +‎ -ology (“suffix indicating a branch of learning”).

entries.meaning: (countable, uncountable, pharmacy, pharmacology) The study of the dosages of drugs, especially the determination of appropriate dosages. [from 19th c.]
(uncountable, mathematics, historical, rare) In the works of English philosopher Jeremy Bentham (1748–1832): the study of quantity; mathematics.
